message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 is a fair reflection of its value, I understand your perspective.  Could you meet me at $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
